description: Premium Makrana white marble slabs, the same marble used in the iconic Taj Mahal. Known for its pure white color and minimal veining, this marble exudes elegance and timelessness. Perfect for flooring, wall cladding, and countertops.

Premium Black Galaxy granite slabs featuring deep black background with spectacular golden bronze specks that shimmer like stars. One of India's most sought-after granite varieties, perfect for kitchen countertops and luxury applications.

Premium porcelain tiles with realistic wood effect finish. These tiles provide the warm aesthetics of wood with the durability and water resistance of porcelain, perfect for kitchens, bathrooms, and high-moisture areas.

Premium engineered quartz slabs composed of 93% natural quartz crystals. Non-porous surface resists staining, bacteria growth, and requires no sealing. Perfect for kitchen countertops and bathroom vanities.
Authentic Red Agra sandstone blocks renowned for their warm red tones and excellent weather resistance. Perfect for exterior cladding, garden landscaping, paving, and architectural features.
